results.title: Reversal of Abnormal CD4+ T Cell Metabolism Alleviates Thyroiditis by Deactivating the mTOR/HIF1a/Glycolysis Pathway

results.title: Metformin attenuates diabetic renal injury via the AMPK-autophagy axis
results.text_hl: Increasing evidence suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a characteristic oral hypoglycemic drug used for treating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, exerts beneficial effects on various medical conditions and diseases, including @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013966 @@@thyroid-related disorders@@@.

results.title: To study effects of metformin on thyroid functions in type-2 diabetes mellitus in patients attending OPD at Government Medical College, Bidar.
results.text_hl: Conclusion: Thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) levels may be somewhat or not at all decreased by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Thyroid function monitoring is crucial for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, particularly if they already have @<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013966 @@@thyroid problems@@@.

results.title: Metformin Reduces Thyroid Cancer Tumor Growth in the Metastatic Niche of Bone by Inhibiting Osteoblastic RANKL Productions.
results.text_hl: ...Background: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has antitumoral actions in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@, including the @<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013966 @@@thyroid@@@, while its effects on metastatic lesions are unclear.

results.title: Metformin and thyroid disease.
results.text_hl: Accordingly, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have a smaller @<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013966 @@@thyroid@@@ volume and a lower risk of incident @DISEASE_Goiter @DISEASE_MESH:D006042 @@@goiter@@@, @DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@thyroid nodule@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@.
